title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding
description: If the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: In the properties file, when the key is left blank but it has a valid value, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
EB: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Set the externalized text in the chart title. 2. Verify that the externalized text is correctly displayed.
